name: App-CM, Inc.
description: Developer of an in-line video ads platform designed to provide open-source video compression. The company's advertising platform uses unique video-player technology, without requiring large data traffic, to enable compression of up to one-tenth to one-twentieth in data volume compared to typical formats which are conventionally used for mobile video ad networks, enabling advertisers to publish their ad videos with peace of mind.
one_liner: Developer of an in-line video ads platform designed to provide open-source video compression. The company's advertising platform uses unique video-player technology, without requiring large data traffic, to enable compression of up to one-tenth to one-twentieth in data volume compared to typical formats which are conventionally used for mobile video ad networks, enabling advertisers to publish their ad videos with peace of mind.
